name: Braised Beef Rice Bowl
recipe: Roasted duck breast (served pink) with gratin potato and a griottine cherry sauce

name: Midnight Truffle Chilly Burger
recipe: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette

name: Vanilla Classic Burger
recipe: Choclate Chip Cookies filled with Vanilla Ice Cream and Rolled in Chocolate Chips and Nuts

name: Vanilla Caramel
recipe: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette

name: Avocado Strawberry
recipe: We took our signature Avocado Ice Cream and swirled in a ribbon of Strawberry Sorbet made with real strawberries. The tart freshness of the berry pairs beautifully with the Avocado both in looks and taste.

name: Strawberry Supreme
recipe: Our ode to the classic flavor. A rich Strawberry Ice Cream with more strawberries added in as it spun in the batch freezer, and as it came out of the machine we layered in a Strawberry Sorbet for a bit of brightness to create a full sensory strawberry experience!

name: Strawberry Ice Cream Cake
recipe: Dessert masterpiece consisting of layers of freshly baked Spice Cake, Sweet Cream Ice Cream and Strawberry Sorbet, topped with crunchy oat streusel and lashings of white chocolate. Take all the layers in one bite, and your senses will be treated to a symphony of flavor!

name: Pink Drink
recipe: Our crisp Strawberry Açaí Refreshers® beverage—with accents of passion fruit and combined with creamy coconutmilk—evokes a fruity and refreshing sip of spring, no matter what time of year.

name: Pastillas De Leche
recipe: Our tribute to on Tres Leches Cake and the famous Bulacan confection, we soak freshly-baked cake with condensed milk, and layer it with freshly spun Condensed Milk Ice Cream with a hint of dayap zest, and topped with miniature pastillas de leche and drizzled white chocolate.

name: Dark Chocolate Decadence Ice Cream Cake
recipe: Made with freshly baked Chocolate Cake, Dark Chocolate Ice Cream loaded with chocolate-covered potato chips, pretzels and caramel popcorn, and topped with nut praline and dark chocolate drizzle!

name: Frozen Pineapple Passionfruit Lemonade
recipe: Tropical flavors of pineapple and passionfruit blended with real diced pineapple, strawberry puree and lemonade for a refreshingly frozen, vibrant escape in a cup.

name: Peppermint Hot Chocolate
recipe: A big welcome back to our classic holiday hot chocolate—lovingly made with chocolaty mocha sauce, peppermint-flavored syrup and steamed milk and sweetly topped with whipped cream and dark-chocolate curls.

name: Mango Dragonfruit
recipe: A tropical-inspired pick-me-up—crafted with a refreshing combination of sweet mango and dragonfruit flavors and hand-shaken with ice plus a scoop of real diced dragonfruit.

name: Iced Peppermint Mocha
recipe: Our festive all-star Peppermint Mocha brightens the holidays: signature Espresso Roast combines with milk and ice, sweet mocha sauce and peppermint-flavored syrup, topped with whipped cream and dark-chocolate curls.

name: Rainbow Popsicle
recipe: The RAINBOW PRIDE POP is the OG Pride Pop that started it all! A juice-based Ice Pop with layers of Strawberry, Orange, Mango, Green Apple, Blueberry and Grape, made with REAL fruit and fruit juices! It's a light, refreshing, treat that is loved by all! Dairy-free and Vegan-friendly!

name: Cookies and Cream Popsicle
recipe: Cookies n' creme Ice Cream bar dipped into white chocolate and rolled in even more crushed Oreos! If You love Cookies n' Creme, this is the Ice Cream bar for you!

name: Caramel Brulée Latte
recipe: Our signature espresso, steamed milk and rich caramel brulée sauce finished with whipped cream and a supreme topping of even more caramel brulée bits.

name: Iced White Chocolate Mocha
recipe: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce, milk and ice, and then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream to create this supreme white chocolate delight.

name: Soy Garlic Chicken Rice Bowl
recipe: Pan roasted haddock fillet wrapped in smoked French bacon with pea purée and tomato and chive vinaigrette

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
recipe: We combine our rich, full-bodied espresso with vanilla-flavored syrup, milk and ice, then top it off with a caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.

name: White Hot Chocolate
recipe: A traditional hot chocolate beverage made with white chocolate sauce and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

name: Matcha Tea Latte
recipe: Smooth and creamy matcha sweetened just right and served with steamed milk. This favorite will transport your senses to pure green delight.
